--- DateTime: 2021/12/30 14:13
---@class bt_ac_count_down
local bt_ac_count_down = SimpleClassUtil:class(IAction)

function bt_ac_count_down:initData(data)

end

---@param blackBoard BlackBoard_BattleBase
function bt_ac_count_down:doAction(blackBoard,agent,dt)
    if blackBoard and blackBoard._gcd > 0 then
        blackBoard._gcd = blackBoard._gcd - dt
        return  Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Running
    end
    return Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Success
end

return bt_ac_count_down
